section_overview: Myakka City’s TerraNova runs like a purpose-built show campus: spacious competition arenas, generous warm-up, and clear lanes from stabling to in-gates so you can cycle trips without missing a gate call. Vendor row sits close to the barns for fast fixes and caffeine runs. Expect organized schooling blocks, tidy tractor drags, and a straightforward jog strip—plan your hack windows and keep a ring bag ready for quick swaps between equitation, derbies, and the GP ring.
section_img_alt: Stadium arena, warm-up, and stabling at TerraNova Equestrian Center in Myakka City, Florida
section_meta_description: Insider venue profile for TerraNova Equestrian Center: warm-up flow, jog strip basics, vendor row access, and stabling tips tailored to A-circuit hunter/jumper riders.
section_open_graph_title: TerraNova Equestrian Center — Venue Guide for A-Circuit Riders
section_open_graph_description: Upbeat, practical notes on warm-up rings, the jog strip, vendor row, and stabling so you can move efficiently between trips at TerraNova.
section_search_description: Authoritative, rider-focused overview of TerraNova with warm-up, jog strip, vendor row, and stabling tips for hunters, jumpers, and equitation.

section_spotlight.title: Quick Hits for Show Week
bullets: Warm-up ring: call your lines early; pass left-to-left; flat during off-peak to avoid in-gate compression before big eq and derby trips.
Jog strip: arrive polished and five minutes early; number visible; keep a rag for last-second boot wipe and a spare stick in the ring bag.
Vendor row: close to stabling—phone ahead for studs, spur straps, or braiding yarn; stash tape, a hole punch, and extra keepers.
Stabling: aisles stay active—trunks flush, hoses coiled; fans secured; lunging only in designated spaces to keep traffic moving.
Footing & drags: expect efficient drags; confirm schooling windows with the in-gate if weather pops up—pack a cooler and a rain sheet.
Logistics: golf carts share lanes with lead-ins—slow at pinch points; allow a few extra minutes at peak ring changeovers.
Fuel: on-site concessions near vendor row; mobile-order when possible to keep you within earshot of gate calls.
